thread.title: Gossip Girl star Penn Badgley marries Domino Kirke in low-key New York wedding
thread.title_full: Gossip Girl star Penn Badgley marries Domino Kirke in low-key New York wedding - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Gossip Girl star Penn Badgley marries Domino Kirke in low-key New York wedding
text:
Gossip Girl star Penn Badgley marries Domino Kirke in low-key New York wedding The 30-year-old quietly wed his London-born girlfriend in New York on Monday Share Comments By Zoe Shenton 22:51, 27 FEB 2017 Celebs Congratulations! (Photo: Instagram) celebs Gossip Girl fans will be disappointed to hear Penn Badgley is now a marrried man.
Penn, who used to date his former co-star Blake Lively, wed Domino Kirke on Monday in a courthouse in Brooklyn, reports E! News.
It was reportedly a low-key affiar with a handful of friends and family, who later shared sweet pictures of the pair on social media, in attendance.
London-born singer Domino, whose sister is Girls' star Jemima Kirke, looked elegant in a delicate lace knee length dress, while Penn wore a dark blue suit and tie.
The happy couple (Photo: Instagram) (Photo: Instagram) "Congratulations ya sh**heads! @PennBadgley and @DominoKirke it's all downhill from here. In a good way!" Jemima wrote on Twitter after the couple said 'I do'.
https://www.instagram.com/p/BQ_1NctA0T6/?taken-by=lolakirke&hl=en/embed https://www.instagram.com/p/BRBaEzBgsSj/?taken-by=lolakirke&hl=en/embed And Domino's other sister Lola shared: "When someone gets married in a courthouse, it's really an open invitation to everyone but the beautiful bride to explore all that fashion has to offer.
"Here, I try a look simply called 'Pants,' as Cassius goes for 'That Dude from #incubus' and Jemima experiments with 'Off to Therapy!' Congratulations @dominokirke. We love you."
